page.title: 11CHILDREN'S GAMES IN CREWE.
page.content:
{CHILDREN'S GAMES IN CREWE.
The most popular game amongst the Crewe junior school aged boys is {football.}The girl's favourite is {netball.}The girls also enjoy {skipping}singing rhymes such as:{"Keep {the kettle boiling";"Miss a loop and {your'e out";"Donna put the kettle on." The boys also ride their bikes on the Tipkinder{BMX}track performing stunts and racing around a track. A popular game boys and girls play in the playground is{"Tracking".}In this game if you are tuck by a person the other people have to free you without getting tuck. If the people that were in the box get tuck it is the other people's turn to run off. When the bell goes the people have one more chance to reach the door and get freed.
